Paint

Class ImageEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.control.Tab
      • Paint.ImageEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class ImageEditor
extends javafx.scene.control.Tab
    Adds a tab to the image editor
